title: Extracting and Utilizing Multimodal Microscopy Datasets of Images and Text with Foundation Models
content: Microscopy images are pervasive in materials research publications, where images obtained through various microscopy modalities (scanning, transmission, light, fluorescence) are often used to describe the outcome of scientific investigations. Consequently, there is a growing interest in automating processes related to the extraction, storage and labelling of these images, especially for electron microscopy [1]. However, identifying and categorizing microscopy images poses challenges due to the limited availability of extensive labelled image databases.
